home.about: Senior Full-Stack Web Developer with expertise in TypeScript, React, Angular, Node.js, and Python. Experienced in leading international teams, modernizing legacy systems, optimizing architectures, and implementing CI/CD pipelines for efficient deployment. Passionate about building scalable, user-centric solutions that drive business growth.
home.section1Content1: In my most recent role as a Senior Full-Stack Developer at pharmaceutical tech startup Faro Health, I built and optimized REST and CQRS-based microservices and UI modules using TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Jest, and React. I developed feature slices and POCs, designed and executed technical solutions, wrote unit and integration tests, optimized application performance, and built deployment pipelines with GitHub Actions.
home.section1Content2: Previously, I led an international remote front-end team at Various Inc., collaborating closely with designers to modernize legacy JavaScript and Perl-based video streaming apps. We migrated them to a scalable, high-performance React and TypeScript stack with Next.js, MOBX, WebSockets, and Python, backed by REST APIs and a CI/CD pipeline for seamless deployment.
home.section2Content1: Having led a large international team across the US, Europe, Taiwan, and China, I bring deep expertise in TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Jest, and React to drive innovation. Beyond technical design and development, my leadership skills ensure teams stay aligned, focused, and working toward key milestones and company goals.

about.section1: Brian is an experienced Senior Developer with a passion for elegant scalable code, and minimal intuitive UX.

content.1:
Utilizing AI for clinical study development.

The company's flagship product, the Faro Study Designer, is designed to enhance the efficiency and patient-friendliness of clinical protocols.

Faro Health has received significant investment, securing a total of $38.3 million in funding, with the most recent $20 million raised approximately two years ago.

Key features include:

  • Real-time Collaboration: Facilitates accurate and efficient documentation processes.
  • Feasibility Analysis: Assesses the impact of design decisions on study success rates.
  • Benchmarking: Compares protocols with historical data and design variations.
content.2: The Viewer is an interactive webcam platform where users can engage in live video chats with performers, offering a real-time, personalized experience. The platform allows users to view live broadcasts, participate in private sessions, and connect with performers through video, audio, and chat features.
content.3: A wordpress website for the The 2025 San Anselmo General Plan Update which provides residents with comprehensive information on proposed changes to the town's infrastructure, zoning, and public spaces. It features detailed project updates, sustainability initiatives, and transportation improvements. The site also includes interactive public surveys, allowing community members to provide feedback and participate in the decision-making process.
content.4: Launch Brigade is a web design and development agency based in the San Francisco Bay Area, specializing in creating digital experiences that elevate brands and drive business growth. Their website, launchbrigade.com, reflects their commitment to delivering comprehensive digital solutions.
content.5: The Data Analytics Dashboard was a proof of concept application built in Pandas which utilized Study Design data stored in a star schema to create a data analytics microservice and frontend. This app allowed users to slice and dice their study data according to whatever data dimensions they chose.
content.6: An IDP agnostic Single Sign On implementation for the study designer application. Built to allow interchangeable organizations to use their own SAML and Oauth identity provider services to provide tokens for interacting with our api.
content.7: Lotlinx is an AI-driven automotive inventory management platform that leverages machine learning and extensive data analytics to help dealerships optimize inventory turnover and profitability. By providing real-time insights into market demand, pricing strategies, and consumer behavior, Lotlinx enables use car dealers to make data-driven decisions, reduce holding costs, and enhance overall operational efficiency.
content.8: ​Metafold 3D is a cloud-based platform that enables the design and engineering of highly complex 3D models, specifically optimized for additive manufacturing.
